each <S%G1538>man<s%>'s <S%G2041>work<s%> will be <S%G5318>revealed.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G2250>Day<s%> will declare <S%G1213>it,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> it is <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4442>fire;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4442>fire<s%> itself will <S%G1381>test<s%> what <S%G3697>sort<s%> of <S%G2041>work<s%> each <S%G1538>man<s%>'s <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G2076>is.<s%>
